A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: ————-THIS REVIEW CONTAINS SPOILERS———- The Star Wars movie that ruined everything. Visually stunning but absolutely No story. The bad guys chase the good guys but you never really care because the characters are so poorly developed. And guess what Princess Leia can do? She can fly people. Yep\, she can fly like superman and it doesnt stop there. Luke Skywalker is such a pussy that he only fights by somehow projecting his image across the galaxy while he does a yoga pose on his deserted island. Cant believe this script got approved. Horrible\, horrible\, horrible.
